data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sligo, Ireland to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sligo, Ireland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Sligo, Ireland find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,020 believers in Sligo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sligo, Ireland. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Sligo unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Sligo. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sligo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Sligo, Ireland has a population of 65,600.

We estimate Sligo has 1,020 people who might know Jesus, 58,943 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,637 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
